com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core
Class SynchronizationChange

java.lang.Object
  Change
      com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.SynchronizationChange

public abstract class SynchronizationChange
extends Change

Provides a change implementation that provides some of the common implementations like focusing on a modified element and returning a given name.

Clients must implement the Change#perform(IProgressMonitor) method, and optionally implement Change#initializeValidationData(IProgressMonitor) and Change#isValid(IProgressMonitor).

Since:
1.0

Create a subclass focused on the given element to be modified and described by the given name.

Parameters:
modifiedElement - The element that will be modified as a result of this change.
name - A display name to be shown to the user.
